languages.text: Обрывочные знания о ксеносах позволяют предположить, что эти монолиты некогда были частью могучего транспортного корабля, способного трансформироваться в наземные конструкции.

traits.locale_text: Обрывочные знания о некронах помогают опознать формации: кажется, это трансформированный транспортный корабль некронов "Ночная Коса".

languages.text: Drawing upon your patchy knowledge of the xenos, you guess that these monoliths were once part of a mighty transport ship capable of transforming into ground-based structures.
languages.original_text: Обрывочные знания о ксеносах позволяют предположить, что эти монолиты некогда были частью могучего транспортного корабля, способного трансформироваться в наземные конструкции.

traits.locale_text: The scant knowledge of the xenos suggests that these monoliths were once part of a mighty transport ship capable of transforming into ground-based structures.
The scant knowledge of the xenos suggests that these monoliths were once part of a mighty transport ship capable of transforming into ground-based structures.
Drawing upon your patchy knowledge of the xenos, you guess that these monoliths were once part of a mighty transport ship capable of transforming into ground-based structures.
Drawing upon your patchy knowledge of the xenos, you guess that these monoliths were once part of a mighty transport ship capable of transforming into ground-based structures.
Drawing upon your patchy knowledge of the xenos, you guess that these monoliths were once part of a mighty transport ship capable of transforming into ground-based structures.
Drawing upon your patchy knowledge of the xenos, you guess that these monoliths were once part of a mighty transport ship capable of transforming into ground-based structures.

languages.text: 根据你对异形的零星了解，你推测这些巨物应该是某艘巨型运输舰的组件，这些组件可以转化为地面建筑。
languages.original_text: Drawing upon your patchy knowledge of the xenos, you guess that these monoliths were once part of a mighty transport ship capable of transforming into ground-based structures.

traits.locale_text: 根据你对异形的零星了解，你推测这些巨物应该是某艘巨型运输舰的组件，这些组件可以转化为地面建筑。

languages.text: D'après vos maigres connaissances concernant les xénos, ces monolithes devaient faire partie d'un imposant vaisseau de transport capable de se transformer en structures terrestres.
languages.original_text: Drawing upon your patchy knowledge of the xenos, you guess that these monoliths were once part of a mighty transport ship capable of transforming into ground-based structures.

traits.locale_text: D'après vos maigres connaissances concernant les xénos, ces monolithes devaient faire partie d'un imposant vaisseau de transport capable de se transformer en structures terrestres.

languages.text: 異種族についての乏しい知識から、これらのモノリスはかつて地上の構造物を変形させることができる強大な輸送船の一部であろう。
languages.original_text: Drawing upon your patchy knowledge of the xenos, you guess that these monoliths were once part of a mighty transport ship capable of transforming into ground-based structures.

traits.locale_text: 異種族についての乏しい知識から、これらのモノリスはかつて地上の構造物を変形させることができる強大な輸送船の一部であろう。

languages.text: Gracias a tus modestos conocimientos de estos xenos, deduces que estos monolitos debían de formar parte de una poderosa nave de transporte capaz de convertirse en estructuras terrestres.
languages.original_text: Drawing upon your patchy knowledge of the xenos, you guess that these monoliths were once part of a mighty transport ship capable of transforming into ground-based structures.

traits.locale_text: Gracias a tus modestos conocimientos de estos xenos, deduces que estos monolitos debían de formar parte de una poderosa nave de transporte capaz de convertirse en estructuras terrestres.

languages.text: Basierend auf deinem geringen Wissen über die Xenos vermutest du, dass diese Monolithen einst Teil eines mächtigen Transportschiffs waren, das sich in bodenbasierte Gebilde verwandeln konnte.
languages.original_text: Drawing upon your patchy knowledge of the xenos, you guess that these monoliths were once part of a mighty transport ship capable of transforming into ground-based structures.

traits.locale_text: Basierend auf deinem geringen Wissen über die Xenos vermutest du, dass diese Monolithen einst Teil eines mächtigen Transportschiffs waren, das sich in bodenbasierte Gebilde verwandeln konnte.

languages.text: Çat pat zeno bilgine güvenerek bir zamanlar bu monolitlerin; yere konuşlandırılabilen yapılara dönüşebilen, büyük bir nakliye gemisinin parçası olduğunu tahmin ediyorsun.
languages.original_text: Drawing upon your patchy knowledge of the xenos, you guess that these monoliths were once part of a mighty transport ship capable of transforming into ground-based structures.

traits.locale_text: Çat pat zeno bilgine güvenerek bu monolitlerin, bir zamanlar zemin tabanlı yapılara dönüşme kabiliyetine sahip büyük bir nakliye gemisinin bir parçası olduğunu tahmin ediyorsun.
